title: 128: Tauros
author: Chris Taylor
description:
“Why Oh Why hast thou forsaketh meh? Why?” – said Tauros. The trees they did not respond and so Tauros kept ramming its’ head and spanking its’ tush.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [John](https://www.youtube.com/user/Haklex255)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Tauros)
long_description:
“Why Oh Why hast thou forsaketh meh? Why?” – said Tauros. The trees they did not respond and so Tauros kept ramming its’ head and spanking its’ tush.
